about_the_game:
This is a fighting game specially designed for VR devices, which brings players into a world full of tension. In this world, players will play a steel warrior, standing on the ring to start a fierce contest with other opponents.



In the game, players can feel every detail of the battle. Players need to use the handle to control their steel warriors for attack and defense. In addition to operating skills, the game also pays attention to strategic. Players need to formulate the most suitable combat strategies based on the characteristics of the opponent and blood value. Sometimes it is necessary to take attack to reduce the blood volume of the other party; sometimes it is necessary to take defense to protect your blood from being cut. In battle, the use of strategy is equally important.
The victory conditions of the game are very simple: whoever can defeat the blood value of the opponent, who can achieve the victory of the game. This makes the game full of competitiveness and challenging.
In short, this is a VR fighting game that is worth trying. It allows players to feel the immersive combat experience in the game, and also requires players to have accurate operating skills and strategic thinking. If you like fighting games and challenging tasks, then this game will not disappoint you.



Operation method:
Move ：Left handle up/down
Turn ：Left handle left/right
Block : Left handle trigge
Attack1: Right handle trigger
Attack2: Right handle left
Attack3: Right handle right
Jump: Right handle up
Roll: Rtght handle down
